div.div:
Hello, we hope this message finds everyone doing well. We are currently setting up a delivery system for paper copies of the material that is included on the School Website and google classroom. This will allow families who are experiencing difficulties in attaining the materials to get the lessons and activities. This is our platform for education for the remainder of the year which will conclude on June fourth. Each packet will contain two week's worth of instructional information and educational enrichment. Once again, this is our educational experience for the rest of the year and participation, whether it is on the computer or in the paper packet form, is expected and strongly encouraged to reduce the "slide" many students experience over a long break. You will have the opportunity to receive and hand in the packets bi-weekly at the food pick up times, every other Monday and Thursday from nine to ten thirty a.m. at the Washington Elementary Parking lot for all Bessemer Area Students and Parents. Please, only take packets if access to educational experiences are not available using the online google classroom. The first pick up will be April thirteenth from nine to ten thirty. If that day does not work please be sure to pick up the packet on Thursday, April sixteenth from nine to ten thirty.
These two week packets that parallel the google classroom will be available again on Monday, April twenty-seventh from nine to ten thirty a.m. The previous week's work can be turned in at the same time as the next packet pick up.
A schedule of times for packet pick up and return of completed materials will be posted on our school website and facebook page. Once again, this is our educational platform for learning for the remainder of the year. It is imperative that all students seize this opportunity to participate. Thank you for your patience and understanding during this time of crisis. We hope everyone is safe and healthy. Please feel free to contact your instructors with any questions in regard to your educational experience. Have a great day.

div.div:
Sometimes bad weather or other unplanned emergencies cause school to be delayed, canceled, or dismissed early. We wanted to remind you how you can find that information for the Bessemer Area Schools.
We notify the following radio stations: WJMS/WIMI and WUPM, and TV stations: FOX 21, TV6 (Marquette-webpage-www.uppermichiganssource.com/closings), and KBJR (Duluth-www.northlandsnewscenter.com). We also send out an automated call from School Reach that will usually show up on caller ID as Bessemer Area Schools. We will also try to update our Facebook page (Bessemer Area Schools) and the school web page (www.bessemer.k12.mi.us).
If you do NOT receive the automated call, it is usually because of one of the following reasons:
1. We do not have an updated telephone number for you.
2. You have our telephone number blocked in your system.
3. You do not have a voicemail set up.
4. You have a long pause before you start speaking on your voicemail message.
To update your contact information, please call the school to update (WES- 906-663-4515, opt. 0 or ADJ- 906-667-0413, opt 0) or send a note to school with your child.
REMINDER- IF SCHOOL IS CANCELED, ALL ACTIVITIES ARE ALSO CANCELED. THIS INCLUDES GAMES AND/OR PRACTICES IN BOTH SCHOOL BUILDINGS. NOBODY EXCEPT STAFF IS ALLOWED IN THE SCHOOL BUILDINGS ON CANCELED DAYS.

Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
